name: Something in the mist
description:
Something in The Mist Game

The game inspired by the “The Mist” tale places you in a role of a soldier in charge of kill every monster around the streets. This is the released version for the Darktober 2007 Game Jam with a theme (Ghost Stories) Make a story-based game with a dark theme.

- "After an eerie mist rolls into a small town, the residents must battle the mysterious mist and its threats, fighting to maintain their morality and sanity."

The Team :

Game Developer
Game Designer

Erasmo Soares (Spitzer Games)
- Recife, Brazil

Composer
Daniel Kim (DanKimAudio)
 - Long Beach, California

Sound Designer

 - Long Beach, California

Simple Town

===

This is a demo version and does not represent the final release. 

Stand by for more soon!
